knimeNode.name: GoogleDrive Connector (Labs)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Connects to GoogleDrive file system by Google API in order to read/write files in downstream nodes.

intro.p: This node connects to remote GoogleDrive file system. The resulting output port allows downstream nodes to access the files of the remote file system, e.g. to read or write, or to perform other file system operations (browse/list files, copy, move, ...).

Path syntax: Paths for GoogleDrive are specified with a UNIX-like syntax, /myfolder/myfile. An absolute for GoogleDrive consists of:
A leading slash ("/").
Followed by the path to the file ("myfolder/myfile" in the above example).
